tasks.label: Backup (keep last 5)
tasks.command: mkdir -p backups && git archive --format=zip -o "backups/portfolio-$(date +%F_%H%M)-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD).zip" HEAD && count=$(ls -1 backups/*.zip 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "${count:-0}" -gt 5 ]; then ls -1t backups/*.zip | tail -n +6 | xargs rm -f; fi && echo 'Current backups:' && ls -1t backups/*.zip 2>/dev/null | nl
